alert.note: Alert for Clarendon; Southeastern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:06PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Clarendon and east central Orangeburg Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 506 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Santee Cooper Regional Airport, or near Manning. This storm was nearly stationary. ...Boaters on Lake Marion Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Manning, Summerton, Alcolu, Santee Cooper Regional Airport, Eutawville, Paxville, Rocks Pond Campground and Marina, Foreston, Eautaw Springs, Indian Bluff Recreation Park, Davis Station, Blounts Landing and St. Paul. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 106 and 128. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
